content.description:
Truly one of the premier indoor rock climbing gyms in the Midwest, and possibly even the Nation, Upper Limits West County offers St. Louis over 14,500 sq. ft. of climbing surface, complete with 2 giant lead arches and a massive top-out boulder. And we didnt stop there! 

  We added a fitness room, fully equipped with cardio and weight equipment, along with a private meeting area, spin room, a spectators seating area and a climbers lounge! 

  Upper Limits West County is sure to provide hours of family fun for beginners, while still managing to challenge even the most experienced climbers. Upper Limits has something fun for everyone!
